strapiPost.title: SoNA Brings Holiday Cheer To Walton Arts Center
strapiPost.topic: Sponsored by The Symphony of NWA
strapiPost.content:
The Symphony of Northwest Arkansas continues its biggest season yet at Walton Arts Center with a special weekend of holiday performances, Dec 10-11. 

  • Holiday Tradition:  A Very SoNA Christmas on Dec 10 will celebrate the beauty and magic of the season with a mix of holiday favorites, featuring the SoNA Singers, UA Inspirational Chorale, and soprano Lenora Green. Tickets start at $36. 
  • Family Concert: The Snowman on Dec 11 will feature holiday music for children of all ages and a special screening of the award-winning film, The Snowman, with a live orchestral soundtrack. Tickets start at $10.  

Tickets are on sale now, reserve yours for some holiday cheer HERE.
